phdAdmission.title: PhD Admission Procedure
phdAdmission.subtitle: Applicants submit the following documents to the Rector of the University of Telecommunications and Posts:

documents.2: Master's degree diploma and its supplement;
documents.4: Proof of paid application fee – 110 BGN (for the program exam and foreign language);
documents.5: Declaration according to Art. 91, para. 7, item 2 of HEA – contains personal data and confirmation that the applicant:
5_sub: is a new PhD student (not previously enrolled);
has not obtained a PhD degree;
has not been expelled with/without right to defend;
documents.6: Documents proving competence – publications, project participation, trainings, patents, memberships, language skills, etc.;
documents.7: Consent form for personal data processing;
documents.8: Declaration of authenticity of submitted documents;

phdAdmission.announcementText: The University of Telecommunications and Posts announces a competition for admission of full-time and part-time PhD students for the academic year 2024–2025, according to Council of Ministers Decision № 478 / 4.7.2024, published in State Gazette no. 24 of 21.3.2025.
